data.title: Hongwanji Place
data.meta_description: Offering Jodo Shinshu/Buddhist themed items including books, nenju and other gift merchandise.
data.text:
2024 is the Year of the Dragon. Celebrate by getting a T-shirt today. Those born in 1928, 1940, 1952, 1964, 1976, 1988, 2000, 2012 and 2024 are dragons but you don't have to be a dragon to enjoy these shirts. Available in short sleeve, long sleeve and youth sizes. Visit our online store to purchase.

This notebook sized cookbook contains the recipes shared by the Senshin Buddhist Temple BWA. Pages are waterproof and presented in a 3 ring binder

$10.00
